attribute.name: defaultLocale
attribute.value: OAuth is not supported on this version of DHIS2

mdException.name: net.geoprism.registry.etl.export.HttpError
mdException.message: The CGR encountered an error while communicating with the external system. Check to make sure that your connection information is correct and that the remote server is up and responding.

mdException.name: net.geoprism.registry.etl.export.LoginException
mdException.message: We were unable to login to the remote external system using the provided authentication credentials. Check that your username and password is correct for the external system.
